short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Call logs require too much drill down to debug/test your new IVR. This extension displays data more succinctly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are using twilio to make a complicated IVR, it becomes their call log portal does makes it a pain to see SpeechResult and/or Digits for each POST to your service. It requires 3-4 clicks for each POST, but you have to scan through extremely repetitive attributes like To, CallerZip, ApiVersion... All these things don't change (usually) from post to post. So why are they showing them all the time?

This extension is a highly opinionated tool that will help you cut out the clutter and see the only the data that actually changes from request to request.
